props.name: input-color-background
props.comment: Shared background color for all components similarily semantic to an input.

props.name: input-color-background-hover
props.comment: Shared background color on hover for all components similarily semantic to an input.

props.name: input-color-background-focus
props.comment: Shared background color on focus for all components similarily semantic to an input.

props.name: input-color-background-disabled
props.comment: Shared disabled background color for all components similarily semantic to an input.

props.name: input-text-color
props.comment: Shared text color for all components visually represent an input. The text must sit on top of `*-s-input-color-background`

props.name: input-text-color-hover
props.comment: Shared text color on hover for all components visually represent an input. The text must sit on top of `*-s-input-color-background-hover`

props.name: input-text-color-focus
props.comment: Shared text color on focus for all components visually represent an input. The text must sit on top of `*-s-input-color-background-focus`

props.name: input-color-border
props.comment: Shared border color for all components visually represent an input. The border color must be coupled with `*-s-input-color-background`

props.name: input-color-border-hover
props.comment: Shared border color on hover for all components visually represent an input. The border color must be coupled with `*-s-input-color-background-hover`

props.name: input-color-border-focus
props.comment: Shared border color on focus for all components visually represent an input. The border color must be coupled with `*-s-input-color-background-focus`

props.name: input-color-border-disabled
props.comment: Shared disabled border color for all components similarily semantic to an input. The border color must be coupled with `*-s-input-color-background-disabled`

props.name: input-sizing-border
props.comment: Shared border size for all components visually represent an input.

props.name: input-radius-border
props.comment: Shared border radius for all components visually represent an input.

props.name: input-shadow
props.comment: Shared shadow for all components visually represent an input.

props.name: input-shadow-hover
props.comment: Shared shadow on hover for all components visually represent an input.

props.name: input-shadow-focus
props.comment: Shared shadow on focus for all components visually represent an input.
